Description: Stores high-level invoice details such as id (primary key), invoice_id (unique), vendor and customer information, invoice date, total amount, tax, and billing/shipping addresses. Also includes service period and payment-related fields like due_date and amount_due. Serves as the primary table for invoice tracking and financial documentation.

Stores individual line items associated with each invoice, including item_id (primary key), item_name, description, product_code, quantity, unit_price, and amount. The invoice_id field is a foreign key referencing invoice(invoice_id), allowing detailed breakdown of items per invoice. Supports cascading deletes to maintain referential integrity.
